data.description: CLI and GUI Client for Micro-Blogging Sites
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There will be Jaipo::UI::CLI Jaipo::UI::GUI::Base / Basic
    Jaipo::UI::GUI::General (All-in-One) Jaipo::UI::GUI::Plurk
    Jaipo::UI::GUI::Jaiku etc. And people can use $ cpan -i Jaipo to
    install the whole thing.
